marklogic.body:
What about long-term renters????
I've been paying CVPS anywhere from $40-$140 per month for the past 15 years, Always in a rental apartment or house. How would investments in conservation or weatherization benefit me? Do you _honestly_ believe that a landlord, having retrofitted their property with subsidized insulation or a more efficient Heating system, will in turn lower my monthly rent?? It ain't gonna happen!! We have an opportunity to return some money to the hardworking folks who have paid into this regulated monopoly over the years. These people, many of them renters living paycheck to paycheck, will put this money back into the economy.
